author: fitz
msg: Incorporating more changes from Monday night's meeting.  Done
annotating, now back to writing the new parts for ch03.
* /trunk/doc/book/book/ch03.xml: Tweaks and fixes. Removed a good bit
of the 'other commands' section and put those bits into ch08
* /trunk/doc/book/book/ch05.xml: Fixed xref that I broke when moving
bits to ch08.
* /trunk/doc/book/book/ch08.xml: Moved some bits from ch03 to here for
later use.

author: sussman
msg: * ch04.xml:  rewrite repeated-merge section, and describe how to
resurrected deleted data.

author: philip
msg: Allow neon debugging to be enabled via the config files.
* subversion/include/svn_error_codes.h (SVN_ERR_RA_DAV_INVALID_CONFIG_VALUE):
Renamed SVN_ERR_RA_DAV_INVALID_TIMEOUT to make it more general.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/session.c
(get_server_settings): Add neon debugging parameter.  Extract neon
debugging setting from config files.
(svn_ra_dav__open): Set neon debugging as specified in config file.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/config_file.c (svn_config_ensure): Add http-debug
to initial config file string.
* www/project_faq.html: Mention neon debugging and avoiding compression.

author: philip
msg: Fix issue 1029, make working-copy to repository copies work.
* subversion/libsvn_client/copy.c (wc_to_repos_copy): Use absolute path
to open access baton.  Use correct directory access baton when getting
committables.  Tweak flags used to open the base URLra session.
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/copy_tests.py (wc_to_repos): New test
* CHANGES: State that this now works.

author: ghudson
msg: Benjamin Pflugmann noted that the ABNF would require strings
to be represented as "10 :abcdefghij", which is no good.  Fix
the grammar to use "1*DIGIT" instead of "number" before the
separator in a string.
